job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
D.C. Area
As a member of our Engineering team, you will work with a tight, highly skilled machine learning / data science team dedicated to the development of proprietary consumer insights. You will be working closely with our Data Scientists, implementing highly available and scalable machine learning pipelines.
If you are a Software Engineer passionate for technology who wants to work with a mature, intensely skilled team, values total ownership of your work, and can't imagine a day without coding, we want to speak to you! We're looking for a creative, focused, collaborative, technically curious individual who enjoys both design as well as working hands-on with the code.
If you are interested in working on cutting edge Client and AI projects at Internet scale and speed this is the job for you!
